project-description: A modern e-commerce solution built with microservices architecture. Features include inventory management, payment processing, and customer analytics.
A secure, high-performance banking API that handles transactions, account management, and financial analytics for a fintech startup.
A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, file sharing, and team communication features.
A secure patient portal for a healthcare provider, featuring appointment scheduling, medical records access, and secure messaging.
A toolkit for automating deployment workflows, monitoring, and infrastructure provisioning for development teams.
A customizable CMS with a focus on performance and usability, offering advanced content modeling and publishing workflows.
